about_the_game:
Contingency Plan

Take responsibility for your actions. After your experiments go awry, your creations revolt. Battle against endless hordes of alchemically forged constructs, collecting their parts to strengthen yourself. Ensure your needs are met as you carve your way through your home, unlocking new rooms to fortify it against imminent threats. Each new room brings both danger and improvements, offering essential tools for your survival. Will you conquer the chaos or succumb to the invasion?




  • Manage your needs. Your biggest challenge here is to stay alive and well-equipped. Craft ammunition, feed yourself, and rest to keep fighting. Don't forget, if they run out in combat, the consequences can be fatal.


  • Aim, shoot, and reload! Engage in intense combat with two distinct shooting modes. Aim and shoot for precision, or use hipfire to unleash a barrage of projectiles.


  • Fortify your defenses! The barricades are fragile and need constant reinforcement. Strengthen your barriers to hold back the relentless enemies and protect your shelter!

content_descriptors.notes: The game displays images of body parts such as arms, lungs, and stomachs with the core mechanic centered around collecting body parts to enhance your character.

short_description: "Contingency Plan" is an action-packed resource management game. Fight, repair, eat, sleep. Race against time to rid your home of the spreading corruption. Each new room presents unique challenges and vital survival tools. Beware, your body isn't what it used to be!
